#summary 自己的云：Personal Input Method Cloud

= Introduction =

Our own cloud plugin, or to say customized IM backend

= Details =

The mainpage in http://pim-cloud.appspot.com/

* Use this command to download a clean directory tree from the repository:

svn co http://vimim.googlecode.com/svn/mycloud/ mycloud

* Use this command in mycloud directory to update to newest version:

svn update
